projects.title: Data Visualization Application
projects.description: This application visualizes data from CSV files, allowing users to generate line and bar charts. It includes features for data normalization and a date range selector, providing flexibility for dynamic data analysis and insights.

projects.title: Smart Production Monitor UI Demo
projects.description: Developed within 3 days for the Junction hackathon 2024, this UI demo tackles food waste reduction for HKFoods. The application monitors weight variations on the production line and generates reports, enabling staff to promptly calibrate scales and minimize waste.

projects.title: Full Stack E-commerce Web Application with Next.js
projects.description: A full-stack E-commerce Web Application built with Next.js - the rising framework in web development. The application offers features such as browsing products, adding products to cart and checking out. The app also features some admin features such as admin dashboard.

projects.title: E-commerce API
projects.description: An E-commerce API with placeholder data for E-commerce front-end applications, eliminating the needs for running server-side code.
